QuestData.Title: For the Sake of Spirit
QuestData.Description:
With all of the anima you recovered from Tirna Noch, it is only a matter of time before my grove becomes the target of every anima-seeking enemy of Ardenweald.
I hope Dreamweaver knows what he is doing with this ritual.
Proceed quickly. Speak with Dreamweaver, and see what needs to be done to aid the spirit within the wildseed.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Dreamweaver to prepare the ritual.
QuestData.RewardText:
You're ready to begin preparing for the ritual? Wonderful.
I am also ready!
